General.Name: Trisul S.A
General.Description: Trisul S.A. engages in the construction and development of real estate properties in Brazil. It is also involved in the subdivision of plots of land; and purchase and sale of properties. The company develops real estate projects, including with ownership interest of third parties. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Paulista Avenue, 37, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 01311-902
